Name: Juicy Lychee Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: An easy-drinking, crowd-pleasing, fruity Lychee Martini.
History: Adapted from a recipe thought to have been first made in 2001 at Clay, a Korean restaurant in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Juicy Lychee Martini contains 141 calories
